    describe('field', function() {
        it('glideElement.name', function() {
			var glideAggregate = new GlideAggregate('x_402400_drink_orders');
//             glideAggregate.addQuery('sys_scope.name', '=', 'Drink');
            glideAggregate.addAggregate('COUNT');
            glideAggregate.query();
            var expected = '3';
            if (glideAggregate.next()) {
                count = glideAggregate.getAggregate('COUNT');
            }
            expect(count).toBe(expected);
        });
    });

})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
jasmine.getEnv().randomizeTests(false);
jasmine.getEnv().execute();</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
